description: This file defines a React context provider for managing user session state in a Solana wallet integration. It includes context creation, session loading on mount, and functions to connect/disconnect a wallet, rendering child components within the provider.

methods.name: Providers
methods.description: React component that provides session management context to its children, managing session state with wallet connect/disconnect functionality.

methods.name: connect
methods.description: Function to connect a wallet with a specified user role, updating and saving the session.

methods.name: disconnect
methods.description: Function to disconnect the wallet and clear the session.
